attributes.action: Stop the government interfering in private affairs e.g smoking, alcohol consumption etc (nanny state)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I petition the Government to cease interference in private affairs of the people of the united kingdom, this includes: smoking and drinking as prime examples. The government is responsible for the country, not to attack all forms of public interest. 

David Watt aged 17

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
